document_data.mainbody:
otion of aggrandizement was a type of recreational magical potion from the city of Neverwinter.
When consumed, these potions made even the tiniest people feel larger than life. When consumed by a small-statured humanoid such as a hin or a gnome, the potion transformed their bodies and garb, making them as tall as a human. The potions effects lasted for five minutes.
Potions of aggrandizement saw recreational use during the annual Masquerade of Liars festival of Neverwinter in the 15 century DR.
